name: Fleet-footed serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you a little faster on flat surfaces.

name: Plant threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more plant-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Insect threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more insect-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Spider threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more arachnid-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Slime threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more slime-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Fish threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more fish-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Rat threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more rat-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Beast threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more beastial state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Ursine threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more bear-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Feline threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more cat-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Lupine threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more canine-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Cattle threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more cow-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Cephalopod threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more octopus-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Bird threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more avian-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Lizard threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more reptilian-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Troglobite threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more subterranean state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Alpha threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will turn you into an alpha specimen permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Medical threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body into an experimental medical prototype permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Chimera threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will turn you into a chimera of species permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Elfa threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more elf-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Raptor threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more raptor-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Mouse threshold serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will adapt your body to a more mouse-like state permanently if your body supports such a change.

name: Relfexive photophore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you grow an uncontrollable organ on your head that glows in response to your physical or emotional state.

name: Weak photophore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you grow a controllable organ on your head that glows weakly, sufficient for reading.

name: Photophore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you grow a controllable organ on your head that glows brightly, bright enough to replace a lamp.

name: Hearing enhancement serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one enhances your hearing.

name: Elven hearing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you hear as good as elves of fantasy settings, if your body supports it.

name: Indefatigable serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you have more stamina and regenerate it faster.

name: Hyperactive serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will give you a lot more stamina and stamina recovery if your body supports it.

name: Quickening serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make faster in general.

name: Fast healing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will increase your healing speed by a bit.

name: Light eater serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you require less food than most

name: Accomplished sleeper serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make it easier for you to fall asleep.

name: Practised sleeper serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you capable of falling asleep just about anywhere, if your body supports it.

name: Pain resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you more resistant to pain.

name: Nightvision serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your eyes a little more sensitive to light in low-light situations, granting a weak nightvision.

name: Poison resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one will make you more resistant to poisons.

name: Sheer bulk serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes you develop a very robust build.

name: Immense bulk serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes you develop an incredibly robust build to such extent that you would not be allowed to compete in pre-Cataclysm sports.

name: Tough feet serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one thickens the skin underneath your feet, removing penalties for going barefoot.

name: Tough serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one hardens your bones and muscles, increasing the amount of hits you can take.

name: Durability serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one further enhances your body's durability beyond simple toughness.

name: Unbreakable serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Basically super soldier body durability.

name: Thick skin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. It thickens your skin and gives you some resistance to being cut.

name: Strong back serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. With this your spine reinforces itself and you become capable of carrying heavier loads.

name: Strong stomach serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases fortitude of digestive systems.

name: Good memory serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Improves long and short term memory.

name: Deftness serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Improves recovery from attacks that didn't connect with a target via an increased fight response reflex.

name: Substance tolerance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Improves your body's filtration of intoxicants.

name: Gourmand serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases dopamine production in response to ingesting good-tasting foods and expands digestive system to accomodate more volume.

name: Addiction resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Lowers the brain's reliance on external dopamine sources, effectively increasing resistance to addictions.

name: Animal empathy serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Inserts an instinctual movement pattern that activates in the presence of animals into your brain that makes animals less skittish or untrustworthy of you.

name: Animal kinship serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Rewrites certain parts of your brain to make you move in the presence of animals in such a way that makes most animals leave you alone or be curious enough that they act in a friendly manner to check you out.

name: Terrifier serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Modifies your pheromones and the way you carry yourself to instill fear into the minds of creatures, making them more likely to flee or be intimidated.

name: Disease resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Enhances your immune system against diseases.

name: Adrenaline serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases the response and size of adrenal glands.

name: Less sleep serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Lessens your body's reliance on sleep.

name: Self awareness serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases your awareness on your body's state of being.

name: Masochism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Rewrites your brain to associate pain with pleasure.

name: Lighter steps serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Changes your movement patterns to make less noise while walking and lessens the chance of triggering traps.

name: Robust genetics serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Supplements your DNA with buffers against damage and degeneration.

name: Scout serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases your sight range and allows you to see distant things better.

name: Cannibalism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Rewrites some sections of your brain to cause you to both crave and get an increase in dopamine production when eating your own kind.

name: Psychopathy serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Removes your capacity to care about moralistic actions and morality in general.

name: Killer drive serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Heightens dopamine production when killing something and as a result of that makes you crave it.

name: Weak scent serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Removes most of your odour-producing sweat glands and general smelliness.

name: Prettification serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Like beauty creams, except you inject this one, and it actually works. Makes you more appealing to look at.

name: Heavy sleeper serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Lowers your environmental reactivity while asleep.

name: Albinism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Removes the pigmentation from your body and removes your body's capability to produce pigmentation.

name: Rough skin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives your skin a rough texture.

name: High nightvision serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases the amount of light-sensitive cones in your eyes to enable very good nightvision.

name: Full nightvision serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you an abundance of light-sensitive cones in your eyes, granting better nightsight than most creatures have.

name: Cephalopod eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Mutates your eye structure into that of a cephalopod.

name: Fey eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Replaces the pigmentation of your eyes with self-modulating chromatophores that can only shift into various shades of green.

name: Feline eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Mutates your eyes into those of a cat. Nightvision not included.

name: Bird eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Structurally changes your eyes to be similar to that of avians, heightening visual acuity and perception.

name: Infrared vision serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Changes your eyes to see the infrared wavelengths, allowing you to see warm-blooded creatures in the dark.

name: Lizard eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Structurally mutates your eyes to be like a reptile's. Reptilian infrared not included.

name: Lizard infrared serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Grants your eyes the ability to see into the infrared spectrum like various reptiles, physical changes may apply.

name: Very fast healer serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases cell division rate in response to structural damage, improving your healing factor above normal.

name: Regeneration serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Cell division rate in response to structural damage is increased to nearly unnatural levels, improving healing to a very high degree.

name: Reptilian healing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Grants self-setting and automatic fast repair to both skeletal breakage and wounds of the flesh.

name: Very little sleep serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows your brain to perform short bursts of functions similar to REM sleep while awake, lengthening times you're awake and lowering the amount of time you need to sleep.

name: Tireless serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Your brain constantly performs similar functions to REM sleep all the time, effectively removing the need to sleep.

name: Fangs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a set of fangs.

name: Incisors serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Grows your frontal teeth into rodent-like incisors.

name: Nictitating membrane serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Restores the nictitating membrane that humans have lost, allowing you to see underwater. Side effects may apply.

name: Gills serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you gills, allowing you to breathe underwater.

name: Cephalopodic gills serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you the gills of an octopus or squid, allowing you to breathe underwater.

name: Scales serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body with green reptilian scales.

name: Thick scales serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in thick, heavy green reptilian scales.

name: Sleek scales serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in sleek, hydrodynamic scales like a fish.

name: Light bones serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Lightens your bones, making you faster but weaker.

name: Feathers serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in feathers.

name: Down serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a fine layer of down feathers.

name: Lightly furred serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in a fine layer of fur.

name: Furry serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in a thick layer of fur.

name: Shaggy fur serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in a very thick layer of fur like that of a bear.

name: Gray fur serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in a layer of fur like that of a wolf.

name: Sleek fur serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your body in a layer of sleek brown fur like that of a feline.

name: Lynx fur serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your cheeks and neck with longer fur for better insulation. Fur in other places may apply.

name: Patchwork skin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes your skin mutate into an amalgamation of fur and scales.

name: Patchwork skin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes your skin mutate into an amalgamation of fur and scales.

name: Thickened patchwork skin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes your skin mutate into an amalgamation of thickened fur and scales.

name: Chitin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in a flexible thin layer of chitin.

name: Chitin armour serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in a hard layer of chitinous armour.

name: Chitin plate serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in an inflexible layer of thick chitinous armour plating.

name: Hairy chitin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in a slightly hairy chitin.

name: Furred chitin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in a very hairy layer of chitin.

name: Furred plate serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your epidermis in furry chitinous carapace.

name: Urticating hairs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Loosens the hairs on your chitin as a defense mechanism against melee attackers.

name: Spines serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your skin with sharp spines for defense.

name: Quills serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your large sharp quills for defense.

name: Assault barbs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your skin with loose quills that you can fling at enemies or use as melee defense.

name: Phelloderm serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your skin green and slightly woody and better able to retain moisture.

name: Bark serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your skin in light bark like a tree.

name: Thorns serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Covers your skin in small woody thorns.

name: Leaves serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turns your hair into long grass-like leaves.

name: Lush leaves serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you larger leaves.

name: Verdant leaves serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you large and vibrant leaves that can act as a source of nutrition if uncovered.

name: Transpiration serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Changes your to use the evaporation of water as a way to move nutrients.

name: Flower serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes flowers bloom on your scalp.

name: Rosebud serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes the top of your head bloom with rosebuds.

name: Long fingernails serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you longer fingernails capable of cutting people.

name: Claws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you claws at the end of your fingertips.

name: Rat claws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you rat-like claws.

name: Stainless claws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you claws as if made from stainless steel.

name: Retractable claws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you claws capable of retracting when not in use.

name: Tentacle rakes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives your tentacles large hook-barbed rakes.

name: Ink glands serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you ink glands to spray and potentially blind things with.

name: Bulging reservoir serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes you develop a reservoir of fluids that buldges out of your abdomen allowing you to adapt to containing extra liquids.

name: Talons serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Grows your index fingers into hude talons.

name: Radiogenic serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you capable of healing from radiation.

name: Insect pheromones serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your body produce insect pheromones and identifies you as friendly to most insects.

name: Mammal pheromones serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your body produce mammal pheromones that calms most mammals and makes them more friendly.

name: Disease immunity serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you immune to ambient diseases.

name: Infection resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you resistant to infections.

name: Infection immunity serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you immune to infections.

name: Parasite immunity serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your body inhospitable to parasites, effectively immunizing you.

name: Venomous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your biological attacks inject your enemies with venom.

name: Strongly venomous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your biological attacks inject your enemies with a strong venom.

name: Slime hands serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your hands produce a caustic slime.

name: Stretchy limbs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives a bit more flexibility to your limbs.

name: Rubbery limbs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Signifigantly flexifies your limbs

name: Pseudolimbs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turns your limbs into pseudopod-like limbs.

name: Compound eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you insect-like compound eyes.

name: Strong legs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one makes your legs gain muscle mass to propel you across any terrain, and help carry a bit more.

name: Toe talons serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you talons on your toes like those of raptors.

name: Hooves serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turns your feet into hooves.

name: Alcohol metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows your digestive system to extract nutrients from alcohol and use it as a food source.

name: Troglobitic tunnel pain resistance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Adapts your body to be fine with the aches and pains of underground living.

name: Troglobitic stockiness serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Shortens you but converts the mass into muscle, increasing strength but lowering dexterity.

name: Saprovore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to eat rotting food.

name: Saprophage serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a metabolic preference to root and photosynthesis-based sustenance and the occasional rotting food.

name: Gizzard serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a gizzard, like a bird's.

name: Ruminance serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to eat plants like shrubs and bushes directly.

name: Grazer serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you capable of eating grass.

name: Intestinal fortitude serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to eat poisonous food.

name: Eater of the dead serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. With this those zombies will be looking like a meal-ticket in no time.

name: Burrowing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to dig through almost anything with your claws.

name: Saber teeth serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you grow extremely large and incredibly sharp fangs.

name: Hyper metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Hikes up your metabolism so much that it allows you to directly convert excess food into usable tissue for wounds and such.

name: Horns serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you small horns on your head.

name: Curled horns serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you curled horns.

name: Pointed horns serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you pointed horns.

name: Antlers serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you antlers.

name: Antennae serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you antennae like an insect.

name: Road runner serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes you move a lot faster on flat surfaces.

name: Stubby tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a stubby little tail.

name: Tail fin serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a tail like that of a shark or fish.

name: Long tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a cat-like tail.

name: Cattle tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a tail like a cow's.

name: Rat tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a long rat-like tail.

name: Thick tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a thick reptilian tail serviceable as a whip.

name: Raptor tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a long and somewhat stiff raptor's tail that helps with balance.

name: Fluffy tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a long and fluffy tail.

name: Spiked tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you a long tail with a spike at the end useful for stabbing things.

name: Club tail serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you tail with a club at its end useful for bashing things.

name: Hibernation serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to store fat and sleep for really long periods of time.

name: Resilience serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your body more resilient.

name: Solidly built serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Makes your body really resilient.

name: Tank serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Might as well take a few hits for laughs now.

name: Pain recovery serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to recover from pain faster.

name: Quick pain recovery serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to recover from pain much faster.

name: Very quick pain recovery serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Recover from pain in little to no time at all.

name: Pain junkie serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Start to crave and like pain.

name: Cenobite serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You'll REALLY like pain.

name: Deadening serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Essentially removes all pain nerves.

name: Bird wings serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Grows feathery wings that won't fly but will stop falls form hurting.

name: Insect wings serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you membranous wings like a bee or wasp.

name: Mouth tentacles serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you tentacles around your mouth.

name: Mandibles serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. TUrns your mouth into a system that uses insectoid mandibles.

name: Folding fangs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turns mandibles into spider fangs.

name: Canine ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you dog ears.

name: Lupine ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you wolf ears.

name: Feline ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you cat ears.

name: Ursine ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you bear ears.

name: Pointed ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you elven ears.

name: Rodent ears serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you the ears of a rodent.

name: Web walker serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to walk through webs without being slowed.

name: Web weaver serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gives you the capabilities to produce your own webbing.

name: Web diver serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to use your webs as a way to scale shear drops.

name: Rope webs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to make ropes from your spider silk.

name: Arachnitect serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to use webs to spin suspended walkways between ledges to span small gaps

name: Whiskers serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one gives you feline whiskers.

name: Wiry whiskers serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one gives you rodent whiskers.

name: Fat deposits serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain weight instantly! Fitness nuts hate this!

name: Enlargening serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Try this enlargement serum and get bigger, today! Large Inc. is not responsible for any lack of growth due to unsupported infratructure.

name: Enhugement serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become HUUUGE!!! If your body can support it...

name: Extremely strong serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Dude, you're ripped!

name: Insanely strong serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Argh! Look at my bulging muscles!

name: Alpha strength serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. It's only natural that an alpha such as I be this strong.

name: Extremely dextrous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You can do card tricks now.

name: Insanely dextrous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You can do that trick with the coin flipping between your knuckles.

name: Alpha dexterity serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Alphas ought to be this dextrous, yes.

name: Extremely intelligent serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Deep blue has no chance against you.

name: Insanely intelligent serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You've passed the singularity.

name: Alpha intelligence serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Non-alphas are such intellectual plebeians.

name: Extremely perceptive serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Perceive most things.

name: Insanely perceptive serum
description: A special mutagenic serum, designed to give you a single mutation. Perceive all there is around you.

name: Alpha perception serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Alphas are able to perceive the smallest of details, of course.

name: Distributed neurology serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Distributes your brain across your slimy body. Become basically one big brain.

name: Distributed senses serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become capable of growing and retracting sensory organs at will.

name: Tiny serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become half your original size.

name: Unassuming serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Master the tiny form.

name: Crafty serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become as crafty as a mouse.

name: Slit nostrils serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Flatten your nose and gain thin slits for nostrils.

name: Forked tongue serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a forked tongue.

name: Bat wings serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a pair of leathery wings like that of a bat.

name: Butterfly wings serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain the wings of a pretty butterfly.

name: Pale serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Get pale skin.

name: Spots serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Becomes the collection of polkadots you've always wanted to be.

name: Beautification serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become beautiful.

name: Deluxe beautification serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become very beautiful.

name: Glorification serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become glorious.

name: Snout serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Get a snout.

name: Bovine snout serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become the source of cowlicks.

name: Lupine muzzle serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You were always more of a dog person anyway.

name: Ursine muzzle serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Maybe now you can lick out those honeypots.

name: Rodent muzzle serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Get a rat face.

name: Reptilian muzzle serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Reptile mouth ahoy.

name: Proboscis serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Whether you're more like a fly or a mosquito after this is for you to figure out.

name: Hollow bones serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Hollows out your bones like a bird's, making you faster but not capable of carrying a lot.

name: Vomitous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Why anyone would want to throw up a lot is their business.

name: Persistence hunter serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to pursue prey for miles at a variety of paces until they stop from exhaustion.

name: Extreme persistence hunter serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Allows you to pursue prey for days until they literally die from exhaustion.

name: Fast metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increases your metabolic rate, increasing caloric burn and stamina regeneration.

name: Rapid metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You'll require more resources than most, but heal more rapidly.

name: Very fast metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You'll need to eat a lot but your stamina regeneration isn't anything to sneeze at.

name: Extreme metabolism serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. How you sustain yourself is anybody's guess but you've got a lot of endurance to show for it.

name: Metabolic rehydration serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain moisture from what you eat and have your hunger and thirst be equal, like mice.

name: Very heavy sleeper serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Sleep through gunfire.

name: Webbed extremities serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain webbed hands and feet.

name: Paws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turn your hands into quasi-paws.

name: Broad paws serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turn your hands into large paws that're better at swimming but manula dexteriry and manipulation is going to be a problem.

name: Beak serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain the beak of a bird that'll allow you to peck at things.

name: Woodpecker beak serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain the beak of a woodpecker and peck at enemies all day long.

name: Hummingbird beak serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a hummingbird beak, making those flowers look mighty tasty.

name: Radioactivity serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become slightly radioactive for whatever reason.

name: Slimy serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Be always coated in a fine layer of slime.

name: Viscous serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Increase your body's slime output to be sticky and gel-like

name: Amorphous body serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Make your flesh and pleasing gel-like consistency.

name: Omnicellular serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become one big cell

name: Herbivore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become a herbivore

name: Carnivore serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become a carnivore.

name: Vine limbs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain vine-like limbs to lash at things with or rappel down drops.

name: Vine sprouter serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain full control over vine limbs and their detachment.

name: Hair roots serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Have roots growing from out of your hair.

name: Roots serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain roots for feet.

name: Rooter serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become better at rooting yourself at the cost of being slower on diggable terrain.

name: Chloromorphosis serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Sleeping on diggable soil will satisfy any hunger or thirst you might have.

name: Mycorrhizal communion serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Talk to trees like a sane being.

name: Cold blooded serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You're slower the colder it gets but you don't have to eat as much.

name: Ectothermic serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. You're even slower the colder it gets but at least your food needs are even lower.

name: Growling serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a growl in your voice.

name: Snarling serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a snarl in your voice.

name: Hissing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a hiss in your voice.

name: Feathered arms serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Get feathers on your arms. Not much use beyond waterproofing and very minor protection.

name: Insect arms serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Sprout two extra insect-like arms. They don't have much use currently.

name: Arachnid arms serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Sprout four extra arachnidian arms. They don't have much use currently.

name: 8 tentacle arms serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain 8 tentacle arms.

name: Shell serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain a shell to protect you. Restricts and will destroy torso equipment on growth.

name: Roomy shell serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turn your shell into one you can sleep in and gain warmth in.

name: Tentacle legs serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Swap your legs for some tentacles.

name: Tentacle bracing serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Give your lower tentacles some suckers to keep you in place.

name: Feline flexibility serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. This one changes your muscles, joints, and the movement center of your brain internally somewhat, allowing you to traverse obstacles with ease, it also helps you avoid attacks a bit more easily.

name: Acidproof serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Make your flesh immune to acid.

name: Acid blood serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Turn your blood into acid, make them regret hurting you.

name: Amphibious serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become amphibiousm comfortable both on land and in water.

name: Lidless eyes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Remove your eyelids and replace them with a see-through membrane.

name: Aqueous repose serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Falling asleep underwater should be easier now.

name: Freshwater osmosis serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Hydrate your body by being in water.

name: Electroreceptors serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Become capable of seeing robots and electric creatures through walls but be weak to shocks.

name: Shark teeth serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain sharp teeth like those of a shark and shed and replace them frequently.

name: Fast reflexes serum
description: A special mutagenic serum designed to give you a single mutation. Gain faster reflexes and improve your dodging.
